name: ShowStopper
description:
As the clock counts down, traverse through a hailstorm of hazards armed only with your skills, quick thinking, and the convenient ability to stop time. However, manipulating time comes at an ironic cost.

A puzzle platformer created for the 2021 "A Jam About Time" with the optional theme "Escaping Fate" which is implemented through the timer in each level. 

There are a total of 9 levels all which can be completed within the span of under 5 minutes if you really go for it.

Thanks to everyone btw for all the support that you have given me over the duration of this game's development.

Have a good one!

Music By @OneManSymphony
